revised_title: Anatomical Study of the Nervous System in the Oesophagus, Stomach, and Lungs
tldr: This article presents a detailed dissection and analysis of the ganglia and nerves in the oesophagus, stomach, and lungs. The author, Robert Lee, describes the distribution of nerves in the muscular and lining membranes of these organs, highlighting the importance of understanding the nervous system's role in their function.
